title: Sonna Puriyathu Lyrics Velayutham Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Vijay Antony, Veera Shankar
Song: Sonna Puriyadhu
Lyrics: Annamalai
Movie: Velayutham
Music : Vijay Antony

Andam nadunadunga, aagaasam kidukidunga
Chennai sangamathil thanga medlu vaangiya naanga
Kaarakudi karakaata Gostithaane ..
Kumbittu koopidurom, koothaada vaarumaiyya
Kaaveri neera pola salanga mani kulungi nikka
Thanjaavuru thappaata kuluvirukku
panja kodi parakka paathu neeyum vaarumaiya
Aatathil kodi paraka aasaaney aadumaiya

Tharu pidichu naadhasuvaram,
Vaaru pidicha urumi melam
Thirunalveli seemai aaalum kodalamaada saami aattam
Sokkaney soorakaatha sulandu sulandu aadumaiyaa..
Sokki vilum namma koottam super-a-thaan paadumaiyaa
Sokkaney soorakaatha vaarumaiyaa ..

[Sonna puriyaadhu, sollukul adangaadhu
neengellam en mela vacha paasam] (2)
Onna pirandhaalum idhupola irukaadhu
Naa unga mela-ellaam vacha nesam

Meenuthila maiyma, ellundhu varra yelaisa
Yepulla meenakshi athaan varraan thookiko..

Velayutham peru,en pathu viral velu
Nikkathu indha kaalu, kottirichu da thaelu

Sonna puriyaadhu, sollukul adangaadhu
neengellam en mela vacha paasam
Onna pirandhaalum idhupola irukaadhu
Naa unga mela-ellaam vacha nesam

Meenuthila maiyma, ellundhu varra yelaisa
Yepulla meenakshi athaan varraan thookika..
Gula ye gulsa Gula ye gulsa
Gula ye gulsa, Gula ye gulsa
Jimmuku jimmuku jimmuku jim
jimmuku jimmuku jimmuku jim
Jimmuku jimmuku jimmuku jim
jimmuku jimmuku jim

.... how you control me
Better you fold me, everyday...nananey.
Osandha malayeri, emmela nee yeri
Kudikka kalleraki malara ne kudikuraye ..

Thalayil aadum karagam irukkum
Thalayil ganam thaan irundhadhilla
Thaara thappattom aatamthaan irukum
Thappaana aatam naan potathilla
Puli vesam pottukuttu, puli aatam aadiriken
Vetayaadi mattum naan vazhndhadhu illa
Sandaiyila MGR-ru, saatayila ayaanaaru
Dhillirukum thappu sanda potathu illa

Meenunalla maiyma, ellundhu varra yelaisa
Yevala meenakshi akka varraa thookiko..
Gula ye gulsa Gula ye gulsa

Varappa midhichu raapagalaa olachu
Vazhura jananga namma kachi
Ivanga manasa sandhosa padutha
Thappu nee senjaalum right-u machi

Aadukira aatathuku koodukira kootathuku
kaiyeduthu ippa naanum kumbuduren
Unga veetu chella pilla, ennapola yaarumila
Ungalathaan eppavume nambiduren

Meenunalla maiyma, ellundhu varra yelaisa
Yevala meenakshi akka varraa thookiko..

Sonna puriyaadhu, sollukul adangaadhu
neengellam en mela vacha paasam
Onna pirandhaalum idhupola irukaadhu
Naa unga mela-ellaam vacha nesam

Meenunalla maiyma, ellundhu varra yelaisa
Yevala meenakshi akka varraa thookiko..

Velayutham peru,en pathu viral velu
Nikkathu indha kaalu, kottirichu da thaelu
Gula ye gulsa Gula ye gulsa ..

seo.title: Sonna Puriyathu Lyrics Velayutham Song Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Sonna Puriyathu Lyrics Velayutham Song Lyrics from Velayutham. Read the lyrics penned by Annamalai and composed by Vijay Antony and sung by Veera Shankar. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
